scenes.background: You've decided to drop everything else and focus on the urgent task right now, as requested by Bob. Just as you're deep into the work, [Monica] messages you again, 'I see you're prioritizing the urgent task now. Could you update me on your progress so far?'
scenes.description: 'I see you're prioritizing the urgent task now. Could you update me on your progress so far?'

options.text: I'm in the thick of it; I'll update you once I have more substantial progress.
options.analysis: You focused on the task at hand, showing good motivation, but the lack of immediate update may be perceived as a lack of empathy.

options.text: I'm making good progress. I'll send you the details shortly.
options.analysis: You reassured Monica while continuing to work, showing good emotional perception and social skills. However, your self-regulation might need improvement.

options.text: I'll update you now, but this will delay my work on the task.
options.analysis: You chose to update Monica immediately, showing good empathy. However, it might affect your ability to focus on the task, impacting self-regulation.
